entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-10-09
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Android: Minimum and MaximumHeightRequest are not respected on controls when HeightRequest is also set (same for Width) #25163
  • IOS Xcode 16 Strip exited with code 139 error #25162
  • Visual Studio 17.11.5 causes Windows MAUI to break build #25160
    .NET 8 SR9.2
  • Any view's Loaded event is called when navigating away from the page #25156
  • Changing visibility in child elements does not work #25154
  • Theme issue on Search bar control in .NET MAUI #25153
    Backlog
  • [9.0 RC2, Windows] After upgrading to 9.0 RC2, the game crashes at start both in Debug and Release configuration #25150
    .NET 9.0 GA
  • create xarchive with dotnet publish on windows #25149
  • .AddCompatibilityRenderer() for old renderer using interface IVisualElementRenderer doesn't work in .NET MAUI #25148
  • Toolbar Above Keyboard Not Visible in Entry on iOS Platform #25147
  • [Android] HeightRequest and WidthRequest overrides MaximumHeightRequest and MaximumWidthRequest #25143
  • Microsoft.Maui.Handlers.ButtonHandler' threw an exception. On Release Build - App Launch #25142

Closed

  • Margin presented as Padding on iOS inside a CollectionView #25144
  • [Windows] The title bar is shown doubly if I set `Window.AppWindow.TitleBar.ExtendsContentIntoTitleBar` as false. #22894
    Backlog
  • [WinUI] First Entry/Editor gets focus if put inside ScrollView #11472
    .NET 9 Planning
  • [Windows] WebView2 not handling DOM events properly #22697
    .NET 9 Planning
  • NavigationPage TitleBar Persists if child pages have a title #13807
    Backlog
  • Bump WinAPPSDK to 1.6 #24875
    .NET 9.0 GA
  • [Testing] HandlerDoesNotLeak.DatePicker #24147
    Backlog
  • Cannot Pair with Mac #25131

PullRequests

Created

  • For Android, respect Minimum/Maximum size requests even when size is set #25164
  • Preview SR9.2 branding #25161
  • [release/8.0.1xx-sr9] Fixed Microsoft.Maui.Controls 8.0.90 (Latest stable) Ruins Entry Controls #25159
  • [iOS] Text alignment in editor - improvements (#24859) #25158
  • [ios,tests] Fix iOS Header with Group #25157
  • [XC] Propagate x:DataType from parent scope to "standalone bindings" #25152
  • [XC] Fix passing message arguments to BuildException when logging warning as error #25151
  • [UITesting, Catalyst] Fixed DragAndDropUITests to be more reliable #25146
    area-testing, community ✨
  • [Windows] Fixed VisualState Update for CollectionView SelectedItem #25145
    platform/windows 🪟, area-controls-collectionview, community ✨

Merged

  • Re-enable tests #24912
    area-testing
  • Move TitleViewSetOnShellWorksAfterNavigation to Appium #25094
    area-testing

Updated

  • HybridWebView: Invoke .NET methods from JavaScript #25077
    area-controls-hybridwebview, .NET 9.0 GA
  • Remove duplicated CarV/ColV galleries #23190
    area-infrastructure
  • [Android] Custom back button image color #24993
    platform/android 🤖, area-controls-shell, community ✨, area-controls-titlebar
  • Fix Text entry border disappear when changing to/from dark mode in Android #24433
    community ✨, area-controls-entry
  • Fix Regression with iOS button resizing with text or image change #25122
    platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-button, .NET 8 SR9.2
  • Fixed Microsoft.Maui.Controls 8.0.90 (Latest stable) Ruins Entry Controls #25006
    platform/windows 🪟, community ✨, area-controls-entry
  • ImageButton border (BorderWidth) overlaps the image instead of adding space - fix #21259
    community ✨, area-controls-border
  • Increment build targets to iOS 18 #25140
    do-not-merge
  • Fixed Button doesn't reset to "Normal" if scrolled quickly to the top in IOS #25084
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-button
  • [Testing] Add UITest Stepper actions #25130
    area-testing
  • [Winodws] Fixed TextCell Command executes only once #25066
    platform/windows 🪟, community ✨, area-controls-listview
  • [Android] Tabs briefly display wrong background color when navigating between flyout items #24965
    platform/android 🤖, area-controls-shell, community ✨
  • Fixed Shell Tab is still visible after set Tab.IsVisible to false #24999
    area-controls-shell, community ✨
  • Relative layout content disappeared when Relative layout has the border with border stroke element. #24841
    community ✨
  • Picker in ListView works on Windows but not on Android #24403
    community ✨, area-controls-picker
  • Revert #24222 and simply use `invalidate` instead of `postInvalidate` #24990
    platform/android 🤖, community ✨
  • Fix TabBar visibility when navigating back from a non-tabbed page to a tabbed page #25004
    area-controls-shell, community ✨
  • Port all remaining Xamarin.UITest tests to Appium #24153
    area-testing
  • Fixed Editor HorizontalTextAlignment Does not Works. #25129
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-editor
  • [Windows] - Picker on windows shows "Microsoft.Maui.Controls.Picker" if ItemsSource has an empty string #24276
    community ✨, area-controls-picker
  • [Windows] Fix for the issue with Label text color when resetting from FormattedText. #25119
    platform/windows 🪟, community ✨, area-controls-label
  • [Android] Fix app crash caused by dynamic template switching in ListView #24808
    community ✨
  • [Android] Ensure all controls in Layout with Search Bar are visible in Landscape Mode #24198
    community ✨, area-controls-entry
  • CollectionView, the footer moves to the bottom of the page when the empty view or empty view template is enabled #24997
    area-controls-collectionview, community ✨
  • Stepper doesn't change increment value when being bound to a double in MVVM context (Windows) #24396
    community ✨, area-controls-stepper
  • Try build arcade net9 #25085
  • Disable NSToolbar Tabs #25137
    .NET 8 SR9.2
  • [Windows] Fixed CollectionView with grouping fails to add items when a footer template is present or crashes when removing data. #24867
    community ✨
  • Navigation memory leak: Appearing event not being unsubscribed properly #24507
    area-navigation, community ✨
